Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides for the appointment of 4 more members to the board of the city of Yonkers parking authority
Summary: Provides for the appointment of 6 more members to the board of the city of Yonkers parking authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง1596-c, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to increasing the membership of the board of the city of Yonkers parking authority
